_default.en: Try again! If you are not sure what to look for, check out the help for more information.
_default.fr: Try again! If you are not sure what to look for, check out the help for more information. (fr)

yes.en: Well done! There is a water-body in this photo.
yes.fr: Well done! There is a water-body in this photo. (fr)

no.en: Try again. Are you sure there is no water? Check out the help for information on what you should be looking for.
no.fr: Try again. Are you sure there is no water? Check out the help for information on what you should be looking for. (fr)

AQUA_BLUE.en: Correct! The water has an aqua blue hue.
AQUA_BLUE.fr: Correct! The water has an aqua blue hue. (fr)

no.en: Well done! There are no small pools of water in this photo.
no.fr: Well done! There are no small pools of water in this photo. (fr)

yes.en: Whoa! Are you sure that you see a small pool of water? Check out the help for information on what you should be looking for.
yes.fr: Whoa! Are you sure that you see a small pool of water? Check out the help for information on what you should be looking for. (fr)

messages.yes: Correct! You are looking at the North Pacific Ocean, which is a (very) large water body.
messages.no: Hmmm, are you sure? Check out the help for information on what you should be looking for.

_default.en: Due to the nature of the input (non-deterministic) required for this question, it has been answered for you.
_default.fr: Due to the nature of the input (non-deterministic) required for this question, it has been answered for you. (fr)
